issue.title: pojo.Field doesn't implement hashCode()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-454](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-454). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
org.apache.arrow.vector.types.pojo.Field implements equals() but doesn't implement hashCode().

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-454?focusedCommentId=15937205) by Julien Le Dem (julienledem):*
PR: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/423

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-454?focusedCommentId=15937616) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 423
